mapper.insert: insert into Cart(bookNo, qty, userId) values(#{bookNo}, #{qty}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT b.thumbNail, b.title, b.price, b.salePrice, b.inven, c.qty, c.cartId FROM Cart c INNER JOIN BookList b ON c.bookNo = b.bookNo WHERE c.userId = #{userId} order by cartId desc
mapper.update: update Cart set qty = #{qty} where cartId = #{cartId}
mapper.select: select cRate from Member m inner join ClassDef cd on m.userClass = cd.className where m.userId = #{userId}
select count(*) from Cart where userId = #{userId}
